Comply with the  
New KRA Law!  
  
Don't wait until the last minute when you can immediately upgrade to
CompuLynx's KRA/TIMS Compliant Type B/C Middleware Devices. Learn More
Intelligent end-to-end  
Solutions for all Business  
Sizes  
Accelerate growth and lead in the  
digital era through unmatched Retail,  
Digital Identity & Payment solutions. See How  Retail Management  
all-in-one ERP Solution Speed up your Retail Business with a  
Single Solution. No Complexity, No  
Inconsistent Data, No Struggle.  
Learn More  
Future Proof and Trusted  
Digital Identity & Secure  
Payments  
Stay Competitive and Deliver Secure frictionless  
Digital Identity and Payments Transformation  
Journey for Financial Service Providers  
Get Started  Seamless & Secure  
Visitor Management System  
Bringing Stability and Compliance to  
your evolving Commercial and Residential  
premises Entry and Exit  
Learn More  From Account Opening  
to Card Replacement  
Create Great Experience Provide activated, personalized, and  
permanent payment cards in minutes Learn More  

## We enable companies to future proof your business, maximize every dollar
spent,  
see exactly where you stand, enhance security and reduce the risk of doing
business.

CompuLynx is a pioneer and a leading player in East Africa’s technology
solutions space. For over 27 years the ISO-Certified company has and continues
to consistently and successfully deliver Technology Solutions into two
Practices – Retail Management, Digital Identity and Payment- to over 500+
enterprises in over 37 countries globally.

Read Our Story

# Our Solutions for Various Industries

Whether you’re running a small, mid-size, or large business optimize your
operations and grow your business with our wide range of business solutions.
We offer leading-edge technology solutions for;

choose your industry below

### Retail

### NGOs

### Government

### Education

### Banking

### Our Culture

We don’t just value diversity in people — we celebrate them. We’re committed
to treating people with fairness and respect while creating a workplace where
all kinds of people can flourish and grow.

See How

### Life at Compulynx

By developing programs and policies that support our employee work-life
integration, we have created a stimulating and inclusive work environment .
